trait.name: Simple Weapon Wielder
entries: A simple weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the verbeeg hits with it (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The verbeeg makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) piercing damage, or 17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) piercing damage if used to make a ranged attack or used with two hands to make a melee attack.
